name: Visions of the Past: Antitoxin Injector
description: Delve deep inside the Nightmare Tower and set off a chain reaction that will counteract its poisonous influence over Kessex Hills. [Living World Season 1: The Nightmare Incarnate vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in the Eye of the North.]
requirement: Inject  dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.
